data.enText: to go in a circle around a central point

data.chText: 地球环绕自身的轴心转动。
data.enText: The earth revolves on its axis.
to move around sth in a circle
The earth revolves around the sun.

data.chText: 围绕；以…为中心；将…作为主要兴趣（或主题）
data.enText: to have sb/sth as the main interest or subject

data.chText: 他一生都在做与冲浪相关的事。
data.enText: His whole life revolves around surfing.

data.chText: 她以为整个世界都以她为中心。
data.enText: She thinks that the world revolves around her.

data.chText: 讨论的中心问题是改变俱乐部的名称。
data.enText: The discussion revolved around the question of changing the club's name.

simple_means.memory_skill: re 一再 + volv 卷，转 + e → 一再转 → 旋转

ex.chText: 火星是每24小时绕轴线自转一周吗？
ex.enText: Does Mars rotate on its axis once every 24 hours?

ex.chText: 烘烤过程中不要忘记转动托盘。
ex.enText: Don't forget to rotate the pan throughout the baking time.

synonyms.bx: 指物体围绕自己的轴或中心旋转，在特定语境中指自转。

ex.enText: Seagulls circled around above the sea.

ex.chText: 飞机在机场上空盘旋，等待指挥塔的指令。
ex.enText: The plane circled the airport, waiting for the order from the control tower.

ex.chText: 那个轮子为什么不转了？
ex.enText: Why did that wheel stop revolving?

ex.chText: 怎样才能旋转屏幕上的图像？
ex.enText: How can I revolve the image on the screen?

ex.chText: 地球绕太阳公转是常识。
ex.enText: It is common sense that the earth revolves around the sun.

synonyms.bx: 指物体像轮子一样转动，在特定语境中指公转。

ex.chText: 飞机的螺旋桨在快速旋转时，要离得远一些。
ex.enText: Stay away when the plane's propellers are spinning.

ex.chText: 那位做旋转动作的溜冰者吸引了她的注意力。
ex.enText: The spinning ice skater attracted her attention.

synonyms.bx: 强调迅速、连续地旋转，多指绕轴心转动。

ex.chText: 看！海鸥在港口上空盘旋。
ex.enText: Look! The seagulls are whirling over the harbour.

ex.chText: 新郎抱着新娘转了起来。
ex.enText: The groom whirled the bride round in his arms.

synonyms.bx: 强调速度快，含飞旋之意。

data.enText: to move around sth in a circle
The earth revolves around the sun.

data.chText: 围绕；以…为中心；将…作为主要兴趣（或主题）
data.enText: to have sb/sth as the main interest or subject

data.chText: 他一生都在做与冲浪相关的事。
data.enText: His whole life revolves around surfing.

data.chText: 她以为整个世界都以她为中心。
data.enText: She thinks that the world revolves around her.

data.chText: 讨论的中心问题是改变俱乐部的名称。
data.enText: The discussion revolved around the question of changing the club's name.

tr: cause to move by turning over or in a circular manner of as if on an axis
example: They rolled their eyes at his words
The moon orbits around the Earth
The planets are orbiting the sun

tr: turn on or around an axis or a center
example: The Earth revolves around the Sun
The lamb roast rotates on a spit over the fire

value.def: If you say that one thing revolves around another thing, you mean that the second thing is the main feature or focus of the first thing.

example.ex: Since childhood, her life has revolved around tennis...
example.tran: 从孩童时期开始，她的生活就以网球为中心。

example.ex: This plot revolves around a youngster who is shown various stages of his life.
example.tran: 这个故事情节围绕着一个年轻人展开，描述了他人生的各个阶段。

value.tran: 围绕;以…为中心;以…为主要特征

value.def: If a discussion or conversation revolves around a particular topic, it is mainly about that topic.

example.ex: The debate revolves around specific accounting techniques...
example.tran: 这场争论的焦点是具体的会计技术。

example.ex: The conversation revolved around the terrible condition of the road.
example.tran: 这次对话主要讨论这条路的糟糕路况。

value.def: If one object revolves around another object, the first object turns in a circle around the second object.

example.ex: The satellite revolves around the Earth once every hundred minutes.
example.tran: 这颗人造卫星每100分钟围绕地球旋转一周。

value.def: When something revolves or when you revolve it, it moves or turns in a circle around a central point or line.

example.tran: 风扇在头顶上缓缓地转动着。

example.ex: Monica picked up her Biro and revolved it between her teeth.
example.tran: 莫妮卡拿起她的伯罗圆珠笔，放在牙齿间转动着。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to roll, to turn 卷, 转
rootsaffixes.title: vol, volu, volv, volt

partsOfSpeech.dec: archi〔= arch 弧形〕+ volt 卷，转 → 转成弧形 → 拱门装饰
con 共同 + volv 卷，转 + e → 共同转 → 缠绕
e 出 + volu 卷，转 + tion 表名词 → 进化
evolution 进化 + ism 学术 → 进化论
e 出 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转出来 → 进化
inter 在…之间 + volv 卷，转 + e → 在两者之间转 → 缠绕
in 进入 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转进去 → 卷入
re 相反 + volt 转 → 反转 → 叛变
re 相反 + volu 卷，转 + tion 表名词 → 革命
re 一再 + volv 卷，转 + e → 一再转 → 旋转
re 重新 + volv 卷，转 + er 表物 → 旋转连发 → 左轮手枪
volu 卷，转 + ble → 不断流转的 → 话语不断的
vol 卷，转 + ume → 装订成卷 → 卷，册
